message_list.content: Hola, bienvenido a Celestar Air. Soy Nova, tu asistente virtual de vuelos. ¡Gracias por llamar! ¿En qué puedo ayudarte hoy?
I need to confirm the baggage allowance for my flights in January.

Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! I can help with that. Could you share your route and cabin (Economy, Premium Economy, or Aether Business), and whether you have Stratos Rewards status? If you have a reservation, the PNR will help me pull exact allowances.
Economy cabin, round trip Miami to Los Angeles, and I’m Gold status.

Thanks for the details. For Celestar Air Economy on Miami–Los Angeles:

- Checked bags: Gold status includes 1 free checked bag up to 23 kg (50 lb). A second checked bag is discounted; fees vary by channel and date.
- Carry-on: 1 carry-on up to 10 kg (22 lb) plus 1 personal item that fits under the seat.
- Oversize/overweight: Standard overweight/oversize charges apply above 23 kg or 158 cm total dimensions.

If you’d like, I can pull your exact booking to confirm fees and any promotional waivers. Do you have your reservation code (PNR)?
I don’t have the reservation code with me right now.

No problem. Based on Economy and Gold status on Miami–Los Angeles:

- Checked bags: 1 free checked bag up to 23 kg (50 lb); second bag available with a reduced Gold fee.
- Carry-on: 1 carry-on up to 10 kg (22 lb) plus 1 personal item.
- Special notes: Oversize/overweight fees apply above 23 kg or 158 cm total dimensions; sports gear follows special item rules.

If you find your PNR later, I can confirm any promo waivers or exact second‑bag fee for your ticket. Is there anything else you’d like to check for your January trip?
Alright, that’s all I needed. Thanks.
Glad I could help. Have a great trip in January, and thanks for flying with Celestar Air! Goodbye for now.
